title: 2009/731/EC,Euratom: Council Decision of 21 September 2009 appointing one Greek member of the European Economic and Social Committee
header:
3.10.2009 EN Official Journal of the European Union L 260/28
COUNCIL DECISION
of 21 September 2009
appointing one Greek member of the European Economic and Social Committee
(2009/731/EC, Euratom)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community, and in particular Article 259 thereof,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Atomic Energy Community, and in particular Article 167 thereof,
Having regard to Decision 2006/651/EC, Euratom (1),
Having regard to the proposal of the Greek Government,
Having regard to the opinion of the Commission,
Whereas a member’s seat on the European Economic and Social Committee has become vacant following the resignation of Mr Konstantinos POUPAKIS,
main_body: Mr Fotis AGADAKOS, Deputy Secretary of Finance of the General Worker’s Confederation of Greece, is hereby appointed as a member of the European Economic and Social Committee for the remainder of the current term of office, which runs until 20 September 2010.
This Decision shall take effect on the day of its adoption.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 September 2009.
For the Council
The President
T. BILLSTRÖM
(1)  OJ L 269, 28.9.2006, p. 13.
